frame.label: Library
frame.entry: The (optional) default location of your music. This location will be scanned and loaded at startup when no command-line arguments are given. It is a ':' separated list of directories, and/or .xml, .pls, .m3u, .mp3, .ogg files.
A python regular expression to parse the full path of each file into 'artist', 'album', 'title' and 'track'. Used when there is no tag info in the file.

frame.label: Output
frame.numentry: The size of the buffer used to read/write sound data. A larger buffer may reduce skipping under heavy load.

frame.label: Mixer Device
frame.entry: The /dev entry for your mixer. Typically /dev/mixer.

hbox.numentry: How many songs to remember in shuffle mode so we don't replay too often.
